council_profile.name: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council
council_profile.covers: Blackburn with Darwen unitary authority in East Lancashire
notable_issues: Unitary authority providing all council services (education, social care, highways, housing, planning)
High deprivation — among the most deprived areas in England
Significant ethnic diversity — large South Asian community
Cathedral Quarter regeneration — ongoing town centre investment
Largest likely duplicate payment total of any Lancashire council (33.1M)

data_quality.transparency_notes: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council publishes spending data over £500.

cross_council_context.note: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council is a unitary council in Lancashire. As a unitary authority, comparable to Blackpool rather than the 12 district councils.
